name: ESP8266_Ethernet_Manager
keywords: ethernet, WiFiManager, esp8266, node-mcu, esp12e, esp8266-nodemcu-esp12e, WebServer, Communication, Credentials, Config-Portal, w5500, w5100, w5100s, enc28j60, lwip, DoubleReset, MultiReset, littlefs, spiffs, dns-server, iot
description: (ESP8266 + LwIP W5500 / W5100(S) / ENC28J60) Connection and Credentials Manager, with enhanced GUI and fallback Web ConfigPortal. This Library is used for configuring (ESP8266 + LwIP W5500 / W5100(S) / ENC28J60) Credentials Manager at runtime. You can also specify static DNS servers, personalized HostName, static or DHCP IP. With configurable CORS Header and auto-Timezone features
